projects.name: Synagogue book-keeping
projects.subTitle: Local synagogue management webapp
projects.description: Full stack webapp for local synagogue (probono). Made with React, MongoDB using Node.js and AWS services. Includes admin panel

projects.name: Movies subscriptions
projects.subTitle: Movies subscription management
projects.description: Developed a full-stack web application using React and Node.js/WebAPI for movie and subscription management. Implemented user authentication, CRUD operations for movies and members, and dynamic subscription management. Users can search, edit, and delete data, making movie and subscription management efficient and user-friendly.

projects.name: eCommerce React
projects.subTitle: eCommerce api products with Redux
projects.description: Small React SPA with products api, focusing on product presenting and user experience. I used Redux store management system and presented the user with the overall shopping items

projects.name: eCommerce Angular
projects.subTitle: eCommerce api products
projects.description: Small Angular SPA with products api. presenting products and cart adding

projects.name: Factory management system
projects.subTitle: Factory management system
projects.description: JS Vanilla project, management system for factory employees with shifts and departments. Database SQL using .NET server

projects.name: Users Posts & Tasks
projects.subTitle: Users dashboard management
projects.description: Full Stack project developed with Angular, Node.js and MongoDB. Features user management, task tracking, posts and dynamic UI updates. Allows searching, adding, updating and deleting user data with a user-friendly interface.

projects.name: Guess a random country
projects.subTitle: Rest api quiz game
projects.description: Vanilla JS project. A random country is picked each day, follow the clues to reveal the selected country
